title: Richard Dreyfuss
summary: Richard Stephen Dreyfuss (/ˈdraɪfəs/; born Dreyfus;[1] October 29, 1947) is an American actor. He is known for starring in popular films during the 1970s, 1980s, and 1990s, including American Graffiti, Jaws, The Competition, Stand by Me, Close Encounters of the Third Kind, Down and Out in Beverly Hills, The Goodbye Girl, Tin Men, Stakeout, Another Stakeout, Always, What About Bob? and Mr. Holland's Opus.
